quotes: (from 2023). He currently serves as the head of the party's chapter for Nowon District Eul.
Kim has participated in numerous elections at the district, city, and national levels since 1995, securing victories in local legislative bodies, mayoral posts, and national assembly races.
He was elected Mayor of Nowon District in 2010 and 2014 and won seats in the National Assembly in 2018, 2020, and 2024.
